scripts.build: pnpm build:web && pnpm build:desktop:web && pnpm build:core && pnpm build:desktop
scripts.start:desktop: nohup env RUST_LOG=info cargo run -p promptlens-tauri --bin promptlens-tauri > logs/tauri.log 2>&1 &
scripts.dev:desktop: concurrently -k "pnpm -C apps/web-client dev --host 127.0.0.1 --port 5173 --strictPort" "pnpm -C apps/desktop/tauri-app tauri dev"
scripts.fmt: cargo fmt --all && pnpm -C apps/web-client prettier --write . && pnpm -C apps/desktop/tauri-app/web prettier --write .
scripts.lint: cargo clippy --workspace && pnpm -C apps/web-client lint || true && pnpm -C apps/desktop/tauri-app/web lint || true
scripts.test: cargo test --workspace && pnpm -C apps/web-client test || true && pnpm -C apps/desktop/tauri-app/web test || true
